meta.title: Learnova Academy - Master Programming Skills with Expert-Led Courses
meta.description: Learn programming with comprehensive, bilingual courses in Vue.js, React, Python, and more. Expert instructors, hands-on projects, and flexible learning paths.

hero.title: Master Programming Skills with
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive, bilingual programming courses designed for developers at every level. Learn from industry experts and build real-world projects.

meta.title: About - Learnova Academy
meta.description: Learn about our mission to provide high-quality Vue.js and Nuxt.js education

aboutPage.title: About Learnova Academy
aboutPage.subtitle: Empowering developers with comprehensive Vue.js and Nuxt.js education

content.intro: Learnova Academy is dedicated to providing high-quality, comprehensive education across multiple fields including programming, design, business, and technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make Vue.js and Nuxt.js accessible to developers worldwide through structured, hands-on learning experiences.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We believe in learning by doing. Our courses combine theoretical knowledge with practical projects to ensure you gain real-world skills.

meta.title: Contact - Learnova Academy
meta.description: Get in touch with the Learnova Academy team

contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.content: Have questions about our courses or need support? Reach out to us through any of the channels below.
